negative.title: Negative Cash Flow
negative.description: Your monthly expenses exceed your income. Review your expenses or increase your income.

lowSavings.title: Low Savings Rate
lowSavings.description: Your savings rate is very low. Try to save more money to increase your financial security.

lowIncome.title: Low Income
lowIncome.description: Your monthly income is very low. Consider additional income sources or passive investments.

highRatio.title: High Debt Ratio
highRatio.description: Your debt-to-asset ratio is too high. Consider debt reduction or building assets.

highServiceRatio.title: High Debt Service Ratio
highServiceRatio.description: Your monthly debt payments are very high relative to your income. Consider refinancing or increasing income.

lowAssetCoverage.title: Insufficient Asset Coverage
lowAssetCoverage.description: Your debts are higher than your assets. Build wealth to improve your financial stability.

insufficient.title: Insufficient Emergency Fund
insufficient.description: Your emergency fund is not sufficient to cover your expenses for several months. Build a buffer.

excellent.title: Excellent Emergency Fund
excellent.description: Your emergency fund is excellent. You can redirect excess funds to investments.

lowRatio.title: Low Passive Income Ratio
lowRatio.description: Your passive income is too low. Consider investments in dividend-paying assets.

goodProgress.title: Good Progress on Passive Income
goodProgress.description: You're making good progress building passive income. Continue your strategy.

none.title: No Passive Income
none.description: You don't have any passive income yet. Start with small investments in dividend stocks.

excellent.title: Excellent Savings Rate
excellent.description: Your savings rate is outstanding. You're on the best path to financial independence.

good.title: Good Savings Rate
good.description: You have a good savings rate. Use this for strategic investments.

noAssets.title: No Assets
noAssets.description: You haven't recorded any assets yet. Start building your portfolio.

negativeNetWorth.title: Negative Net Worth
negativeNetWorth.description: Your net worth is negative. Focus on reducing debt.

strongPosition.title: Strong Financial Position
strongPosition.description: You have an excellent financial position. Optimize your strategy for the future.

overview.positiveNetWorth: Your net worth is positive, indicating good financial health.
overview.negativeNetWorth: Your net worth is negative. Consider reducing liabilities or increasing assets.

alert.negativeCashFlowDesc: Your monthly expenses exceed your income.
alert.highDebtRatioDesc: Your debts represent more than 50% of your assets.

sectorDiversification.title: Diversify Sectors
sectorDiversification.description: Your portfolio is concentrated in one sector. Consider diversifying across multiple sectors.

geographicalDiversification.title: Diversify Geographically
geographicalDiversification.description: Your investments are concentrated in one region. Consider global diversification.

assetTypeBalance.title: Balance Asset Types
assetTypeBalance.description: Your portfolio is heavily weighted in one asset type. Consider balancing across different asset classes.

smallPortfolio.title: Grow Your Portfolio
smallPortfolio.description: Your portfolio is quite small. Consider regular investments to build wealth over time.

addDividendStocks.title: Add Dividend Stocks
addDividendStocks.description: Consider adding dividend-paying stocks to generate regular passive income.

rebalancePortfolio.title: Rebalance Portfolio
rebalancePortfolio.description: Your asset allocation has drifted. Consider rebalancing to maintain your target allocation.

lowYieldPortfolio.title: Increase Portfolio Yield
lowYieldPortfolio.description: Your portfolio yield is low. Consider higher-yielding investments for better income generation.

addREITs.title: Consider REITs
addREITs.description: Real Estate Investment Trusts can provide diversification and regular income.

diversifyIncomeSources.title: Diversify Income Sources
diversifyIncomeSources.description: You rely on a single income source. Consider creating additional income streams.

increasePassiveIncome.title: Increase Passive Income
increasePassiveIncome.description: Your passive income is low relative to expenses. Focus on income-generating investments.

irregularIncome.title: Stabilize Income
irregularIncome.description: Your income is irregular. Consider building emergency funds and stable income sources.

lowIncomeGrowth.title: Focus on Income Growth
lowIncomeGrowth.description: Your income growth is stagnant. Consider skill development or career advancement.

sideHustle.title: Start a Side Business
sideHustle.description: A side business could provide additional income and long-term wealth building.

skillDevelopment.title: Invest in Skills
skillDevelopment.description: Developing new skills can lead to higher earning potential and career growth.

freelancing.title: Consider Freelancing
freelancing.description: Freelancing can provide flexible additional income and skill development.

negotiateSalary.title: Negotiate Your Salary
negotiateSalary.description: Regular salary negotiations can significantly impact long-term wealth accumulation.

highExpenseRatio.title: Reduce Expense Ratio
highExpenseRatio.description: Your expenses are high relative to income. Focus on cutting unnecessary costs.

trackExpenses.title: Track Your Expenses
trackExpenses.description: Detailed expense tracking helps identify areas for potential savings.

budgetCreation.title: Create a Budget
budgetCreation.description: A well-planned budget can help optimize your spending and increase savings.

subscriptionAudit.title: Audit Subscriptions
subscriptionAudit.description: Review and cancel unused subscriptions to reduce recurring expenses.

expenseCategories.title: Categorize Expenses
expenseCategories.description: Organizing expenses by category helps identify spending patterns and optimization opportunities.

automateExpenses.title: Automate Fixed Expenses
automateExpenses.description: Automating bill payments can help avoid late fees and improve cash flow management.

highDebtRatio.title: Reduce Debt Load
highDebtRatio.description: Your debt-to-asset ratio is high. Focus on debt reduction strategies.

highInterestDebt.title: Pay High-Interest Debt
highInterestDebt.description: Prioritize paying off high-interest debt to save on interest payments.

debtConsolidation.title: Consider Debt Consolidation
debtConsolidation.description: Consolidating debt could reduce interest rates and simplify payments.

createDebtPayoffPlan.title: Create Debt Payoff Plan
createDebtPayoffPlan.description: A structured debt payoff plan can accelerate your path to financial freedom.

emergencyFund.title: Build Emergency Fund
emergencyFund.description: An emergency fund covering 3-6 months of expenses provides financial security.

retirementPlanning.title: Plan for Retirement
retirementPlanning.description: Start or increase retirement contributions to secure your financial future.

setFinancialGoals.title: Set Financial Goals
setFinancialGoals.description: Clear financial goals provide direction and motivation for your money management.

reviewInsurance.title: Review Insurance Coverage
reviewInsurance.description: Adequate insurance protects your wealth from unexpected events.

settings.confirmClearLogs: Are you sure you want to clear all debug logs?
settings.appDescription: Track your assets, liabilities, income, and expenses to achieve financial independence.
settings.debugModeDescription: Additional debug features are enabled. Disable in production.
settings.clearPartialDataDescription: Deletes all financial data (assets, expenses, liabilities, etc.) but keeps settings like API keys and exchange rates
settings.clearAllDataDescription: Deletes all data including API keys and settings
settings.confirmClearPartialData: Are you sure you want to clear all financial data? This cannot be undone.
settings.confirmClearAllData: Are you sure you want to clear ALL data including API keys? This cannot be undone.
settings.enableStockApiDescription: Enable or disable stock API integration

hubRecommendations.debtReductionDesc: Your debt-to-asset ratio is high. Consider paying down debts to improve financial health.
hubRecommendations.improveIncomeDesc: Your expenses exceed income. Consider increasing income or reducing expenses.
hubRecommendations.diversifyIncomeDesc: Add more income sources to reduce financial risk and improve stability.
hubRecommendations.trackExpensesDesc: Monitor and categorize your expenses to identify saving opportunities.
hubRecommendations.portfolioAnalysisDesc: Review your asset allocation and performance to optimize returns.

forecast.title: Financial Forecast
forecast.subtitle: Project your financial future
forecast.aboutDescription: Financial forecasting helps you project your future financial situation based on current assets, income, and expenses.

totalExpenseCoverage.title: Total Expense Coverage
totalExpenseCoverage.description: Track the percentage of your monthly total expenses covered by passive income. This includes all expenses, including fixed costs, variable costs, and debt payments.
totalExpenseCoverage.noExpenses: No expenses recorded yet. Add your expenses to monitor total expense coverage.
totalExpenseCoverage.milestone25: 25% of total expenses covered by passive income!
totalExpenseCoverage.milestone50: Halfway there! 50% of expenses covered by passive income
totalExpenseCoverage.milestone75: Almost there! 75% of expenses covered by passive income
totalExpenseCoverage.milestone100: Complete financial freedom achieved! All expenses covered by passive income ðŸŽ‰

assets.title: Start Your Investment Journey!
assets.description: Assets are the foundation of your wealth. Add your first investment and begin your path to financial independence.
assets.motivationalText: Every successful investment journey starts with the first asset!
tips: Start with an asset you already own
Regular investments pay off in the long run

income.title: Track Your Income Sources!
income.description: Income is the engine of your wealth building. Document all income sources to improve your financial overview.
income.motivationalText: Multiple income sources create financial security!
tips: Distinguish between active and passive income

expenses.title: Keep Track of Your Expenses!
expenses.description: Controlling expenses is the first step to financial freedom. Track your recurring costs for better budget planning.
expenses.motivationalText: Those who know their expenses can optimize them!
tips: Start with your largest expense items
Small savings add up to big amounts

liabilities.title: Strategically Reduce Debt!
liabilities.description: Reducing liabilities is an important step toward financial independence. Document your debts to systematically reduce them.
liabilities.motivationalText: Every paid-off debt brings you closer to freedom!
tips: Prioritize debts with high interest rates
Small additional payments significantly shorten the term

portfolio.title: Your Portfolio Awaits You!
portfolio.description: A diversified portfolio is the key to long-term success. Add assets to track your portfolio.
portfolio.motivationalText: Diversification is the only free lunch in finance!

analytics.noData: No data available for analysis yet
analytics.addDataFirst: Add assets, income, or expenses first to get meaningful analytics.

charts.addDataToSeeChart: Add data to see this chart
charts.comingSoon: This view will be available once you add relevant data

forecast.title: Plan Your Financial Future!
forecast.description: Forecasts help you make informed financial decisions. Add assets and income to project your future.
forecast.motivationalText: The best time to invest was 20 years ago. The second best time is now!

sectorDiversification.title: Improve Sector Diversification
sectorDiversification.description: Your portfolio is concentrated in specific sectors. Consider spreading investments across different sectors.

geographicalDiversification.title: Add Geographic Diversification
geographicalDiversification.description: Your assets are geographically concentrated. Consider international diversification to reduce regional risk.

assetTypeDiversification.title: Diversify Asset Types
assetTypeDiversification.description: Your portfolio could benefit from diversification across different asset classes (stocks, bonds, real estate).

undervaluedAssets.title: Review Undervalued Assets
undervaluedAssets.description: Some of your assets may be undervalued. Consider whether it's time to rebalance or add to these positions.

portfolioRebalancing.title: Rebalance Portfolio
portfolioRebalancing.description: Your portfolio allocation has drifted from targets. Consider rebalancing to maintain desired risk profile.

lossPositions.title: Review Loss Positions
lossPositions.description: You have assets in loss positions. Consider tax-loss harvesting or cutting losses on underperforming investments.

updateAssetPrices.title: Update Asset Prices
updateAssetPrices.description: Some asset prices may be outdated. Update prices to get accurate portfolio valuations.

assetCategories.title: Complete Asset Categories
assetCategories.description: Some assets lack complete categorization. Add sector and country information for better analysis.

increasePassiveIncome.title: Boost Passive Income
increasePassiveIncome.description: Your passive income is low relative to expenses. Consider dividend-paying stocks or REITs.

addDividendAssets.title: Add Dividend Assets
addDividendAssets.description: You have few dividend-paying assets. Consider adding dividend stocks or funds for regular income.

optimizeRentalIncome.title: Optimize Rental Income
optimizeRentalIncome.description: Your rental properties could generate more income. Consider improvements or rent optimization.

diversifyIncomeSources.title: Diversify Income Sources
diversifyIncomeSources.description: You rely heavily on single income sources. Add diversified streams to reduce income risk.

addInterestIncome.title: Add Interest Income
addInterestIncome.description: Consider fixed-income investments like bonds or CDs for stable interest income.

planIncomeGrowth.title: Plan Income Growth
planIncomeGrowth.description: Your current income growth trajectory could be improved. Consider career advancement or skill development.

developSideHustle.title: Develop Side Income
developSideHustle.description: A side business or freelance work could provide additional income streams.

optimizeIncomeTiming.title: Optimize Income Timing
optimizeIncomeTiming.description: Consider timing of income recognition for tax optimization and cash flow management.

completeExpenseCategories.title: Complete Expense Categories
completeExpenseCategories.description: Add more detailed expense categories for better budget tracking and analysis.

reduceHighExpenses.title: Reduce High Expenses
reduceHighExpenses.description: Some expense categories are unusually high. Review and consider cost-cutting opportunities.

auditSubscriptions.title: Audit Subscriptions
auditSubscriptions.description: Review recurring subscriptions and cancel unused services to reduce monthly expenses.

budgetControl.title: Improve Budget Control
budgetControl.description: Your expenses exceed healthy budget ratios. Consider stricter budget controls.

planSeasonalExpenses.title: Plan Seasonal Expenses
planSeasonalExpenses.description: Prepare for seasonal expense variations by setting aside funds throughout the year.

createEmergencyBuffer.title: Create Emergency Expense Buffer
createEmergencyBuffer.description: Build a buffer for unexpected expenses to avoid dipping into investments.

reduceHighInterestDebt.title: Tackle High-Interest Debt
reduceHighInterestDebt.description: You have high-interest debt. Prioritize paying off the highest rate debts first.

accelerateDebtRepayment.title: Accelerate Debt Repayment
accelerateDebtRepayment.description: Consider making extra payments to reduce debt faster and save on interest.

considerDebtConsolidation.title: Consider Debt Consolidation
considerDebtConsolidation.description: Multiple high-interest debts might benefit from consolidation at a lower rate.

reduceDebtRatio.title: Reduce Debt-to-Asset Ratio
reduceDebtRatio.description: Your debt-to-asset ratio is high. Focus on paying down debt or building assets.

buildEmergencyFund.title: Build Emergency Fund
buildEmergencyFund.description: Build an emergency fund covering 3-6 months of expenses for financial security.

improveCashflow.title: Improve Cash Flow
improveCashflow.description: Your monthly cash flow could be improved. Focus on increasing income or reducing expenses.

increaseRetirementSavings.title: Increase Retirement Savings
increaseRetirementSavings.description: Your current savings rate may not be sufficient for retirement goals. Consider increasing contributions.

workTowardFinancialIndependence.title: Work Toward Financial Independence
workTowardFinancialIndependence.description: You're making good progress. Focus on optimizing your path to financial independence.

hubRecommendations.title: Smart Recommendations
hubRecommendations.noRecommendations: No recommendations available at this time. Add more financial data to receive personalized insights.
